name: Lead Habit
description:
Listen here -
It don't take much when you're beat.
Prop them ol' feet up,
spend some time with the boob tube. Maybe those little Vienna sausages.
Just a minute for me,
OK?

Play with Sound On
WASD / Arrows: Move
C: Sit
Space: Stand / Jump
E | F: Taunt

Made By:

Nicholas Brancaccio @pastasfuture
Rachel Hwang @backronyms
Desiree Cassidy @heroic_mode drunk_pixel
